climatePledgeFriendly.details: Climate neutral by ClimatePartner certifies the carbon footprint of a product was calculated and all associated emissions were offset.

features: Safe Design for Baby - The mini stroller fan's cover only has 5.5mm gaps, so it will protect the infant's little fingers from entering. While keeping toddlers safe, our fans work quietly and provide powerful wind

Upgraded Flexible Durable Tripod - Material: We used food-grade silicone, so you don't have to worry about the baby eating it by mistake. Tripod: Optimized the tripod fixing method, which is more durable and not easy to fall off. Structure: You can remove the fan head to charge at will, no need to remove it from the original fixed place

USB or Rechargeable Battery Operated - The baby stroller fan has a 2000 mAh battery that can last from 3.5 to 10 hours(Depending on speeds). The portable fan can be used while charging. It is convenient for bedrooms, desktops, strollers, camping, car seat, crib, and travel. （The mini fan is only 5.61*2.51*6.49inches, 0.52lb

Strong Wind & Low Noise - This stroller desk fan built-in brushless motor, which is powerful and has a long service life. Our fan blades and fans cover has been upgraded according to the principle of aerodynamics. So GAIATOP fan can support powerful airflow but also makes the fan operate quietly, it will not disturb you at all when you are working or sleeping
Mini Size with Rotation Design - 360° of horizontal rotation and 210° of vertical rotation, You can always find your favorite angle to enjoy the comfort of the wind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars you need it!!
reviews.reviewText: The Gaiatop Mini Portable Stroller Fan is a versatile and convenient cooling solution for various situations. This battery-operated fan features a compact design with a clip-on feature, making it easy to attach to strollers, car seats, cribs, treadmills, desks, and more. The fan's detachable 3-speed settings allow users to adjust the airflow according to their preferences.One of the standout features of this fan is its flexible tripod design, allowing it to be hand-held or set up in multiple positions for a 360° rotation. This flexibility ensures that users can direct the airflow exactly where they need it, providing personalized cooling comfort.The rechargeable battery adds convenience, allowing the fan to be used repeatedly without the need for constant battery replacements. This makes it an eco-friendly choice while also being travel-friendly.However, some users may find the fan's clip-on mechanism a bit tight, making it challenging to attach to thicker surfaces. Additionally, while the fan is portable and ideal for personal use, its size may not be suitable for larger spaces or for cooling multiple people simultaneously.In conclusion, the Gaiatop Mini Portable Stroller Fan is a reliable and versatile cooling companion for various settings. Its clip-on and flexible tripod design offer convenience, while the 3-speed settings allow for adjustable airflow. The rechargeable battery makes it an eco-friendly option for continuous use. While it may have some limitations with thicker surfaces and larger spaces, it excels as a personal cooling solution for strollers, car seats, cribs, and travel purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my second one!
reviews.reviewText: I liked the first one so much, that when I forgot it at home one day, I purchased a second one to stay in my car so I would never be without it again. I am a nurse and the hospital air just gets stuffy, especially with masks on. This little fan attaches to my cart perfectly and blows a perfect gust of air right in my face whenever I need it, especially during hot flashes, so that I can maintain safety and keep my mask on without being sweaty and miserable! I LOVE it!!! It plugs into the cart and can be recharged to use without a plug at any time. The colors are beautiful pastels that I have bought (green and blue) and to be so small, this is a powerful little fan. It's quiet enough that I can use it in a hospital setting and small enough to keep it on a small portable cart. Very lightweight and keeps the air flowing around me! I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Sturdy and Strong Wind
reviews.reviewText: Even on the lightest selection it still blows pretty good which we love! it’s not loud whatsoever and the purple is super pretty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my treadmill!
reviews.reviewText: Works perfect for my treadmill! Love that I can charge it in between workouts and don’t have to leave it plugged in. Quiet that I can still hear my tv but strong enough to cool be down while running. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great fan, bad legs
reviews.reviewText: This fan has been a LIFESAVER during my summer trip to very hot and humid Japan. It is lightweight for its size, has 3 speeds that are all useful, not too loud, and good battery life. I like how the fan is removable from the base for charging. That’s a great design idea! The legs were super useful to hang the fan, hold it like a handle, or stand it on a table, but as you can see in the photos, after 3 weeks of moderate use in changing leg arrangement, the legs broke off. The last one broke while taking photos, so now I just have to hold it and can’t prop it up or hang it. I’m hoping I can jury rig some new legs and/or hanging apparatus when I get home. This would easily be a 5-star product with the leg issue fixed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Item for Baby in the Stroller
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for traveling to a warmer locale with baby. Used it to keep bassinet in the stroller cooler but also just at night for white noise and air ventilation. It worked great and never ran out of charge (I charged it about every day just in case and ran it throughout the day and all night no problem). It's a good size, easy to travel with and stayed attached and positioned well (I didn't have high expectations for getting a strong grip, but it rotates so many different ways I COULD reliably aim it directionally as needed and it stayed).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny But Mighty: This Little Fan Saved My Picnic!
reviews.reviewText: Let's be real, summer picnics can be brutal. You're out enjoying the sunshine, but the minute the breeze dies down, you're left battling a mini heatwave. That's where this handy little stroller fan (seriously, it's the size of my water bottle!) came in and saved the day.Clipped to the picnic basket, this little guy kept the air circulating and everyone comfortable. It's got three speeds, so I could adjust it depending on how intense the sun got. Plus, the flexible tripod legs let me angle it perfectly, whether we were lounging on the blanket or munching on sandwiches under the shade of a tree.And the battery life? Amazing! It lasted the entire afternoon without even a hint of dying. No more scrambling for outlets or melted ice cream – just cool, happy picnickers thanks to this tiny dynamo. If you're looking for a portable fan that punches way above its weight, this is the one. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use anywhere
reviews.reviewText: We initially bought one of these to use for our baby but purchased more for family members to use outside during the summer because everyone was jealous! Charging the fan is easy and the battery life is great, and the arms make it easy to position this anywhere or to prop it up on a table. The breeze it sends out can be strong (which is GREAT in a Southern summer) and the price is good. Will likely purchase more in the future!

We bought this fan to take to the hospital with us for labour. It was perfect! Easily charges via the chord provided so you never have to worry about swapping batteries. The fan has 3 power modes for different levels of air flow. We love how quiet the fan is! My wife even used it throughout pregnancy to help with hot flashes when sitting on the couch, out at a restaurant, in a warm outdoor setting.Now, the fan is going to be perfect to attach easily to our stroller or car seat to help keep baby cool whenever necessary. The tripod legs are strong and can be wrapped around most surfaces to provide a good, secure, hold.
Esta muy cómodas las velocidades, se ajusta en cualquier lugar, muchos ángulos de movimiento y súper silencioso, no pesa y es estético 👌🏻Excelente opción

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Added this to my baby pram
reviews.reviewText: Added this product to my babies pram to keep them cool in the summer, it’s very powerful sturdy and the battery lasts for ages, highly recommend
Took it for our vacation and it worked so well. The fact that you can charge it by usb is the best and it last long !
En la descripción decía que es de pilas pero la batería es recargable, no lo que estaba buscando….
